application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of Planning Conditions 3 (External Materials), 4 (Construction Management Plan), 5 (Refuse Storage Facilities), 6 (Boundary Treatment), 8 (Sustainable Drainage System), 9 (Secure Cycle Parking Facilities), 10 (Buildings, Roads, Parking Areas and Pathway Levels), 11 (Privacy Screening), 12 (Hard and Soft Landscaping), 13 (Window reveals, door reveals, overhangs and rainwater goods) and 16 (Fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant) of Planning Permission ref: 19/02249/FUL (Erection of two self contained units (1 x 2 bed and 1 x 3 bed) following the demolition of existing garages) dated 29.04.2020All as shown on the accompanying drawings. 4900.P1.07, .P1.08, .P1.09, .P1.10, .P1.11, .P1.12
